BMIX.summary: Brazil Minerals, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the mineral exploration business in Brazil. It owns mineral rights for gold, diamonds, cobalt, copper, lithium, manganese, nickel, industrial sand, granite, feldspar, titanium, iron, and rare earths, as well as precious gems, such as aquamarine, beryl, and tourmaline. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Olhos-d'Ãgua, Brazil.
